price: 82.Yalli tu-abam faxa waqdi cagalah kay amri wohiimik tik-iyyaama, edde luk wohim edde takke!
arabic: إِنَّمَآ أَمۡرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيۡـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: innamā amruhu idhā arāda shayan an yaqūla lahu kun fayakūnu
